EmailTemplate.name: CallBack Contacts Stage
EmailTemplate.subject: Call Back Contacts for {!Entity_CP__c.Name} stage has changed to {!Entity_CP__c.Call_Back_Contacts_Status__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User You are receiving this notification because Call Back Contacts for {!Entity_CP__c.Name} stage has changed to {!Entity_CP__c.Call_Back_Contacts_Status__c}
If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here.
Regards,
Digital Marketing
